data.title: Cornerstone of Centerville
data.meta_description: Strategically located in southeast Dayton at I-675 and Wilmington Pike amid Dayton’s most desirable demographics.
data.text:
Cornerstone of Centerville

CENTERVILLE, OH

MIXED USE DEVELOPMENT

Strategically located in southeast Dayton at I-675 and Wilmington Pike amid Dayton’s most desirable demographics including Centerville/Washington Township, Kettering, Oakwood, Beavercreek, Bellbrook, and Sugarcreek.

Ideally situated on a strong, established retail corridor.

High visibility provided by direct frontage on both I-675 (over 72,200 ADT) and Wilmington Pike (over 31,200 ADT).

Prime location just 0.5 mile of I-675 and Miami Valley Hospital South, a 750,000 SF hospital and medical office complex with over 450 employees, and Sinclair Community College South Campus, a 39-acre education, cultural and community center offering access to college and university classes, recreation, health services, and performing arts activities.

Cornerstone of Centerville North

Premier 156-acre Costco, Cabela’s and Kroger-anchored mixed use development accommodating retail, restaurant, hotel, and medical office users.

Includes a 40-acre residential component providing 300 luxury apartment units, a 19- acre senior living community, and 60 for sale residential units.

Multiple signalized access points provide convenient access.

Cornerstone of Centerville South

72-acre mixed use development offering I-675 visibility.

Ideal location for restaurant, hospitality, entertainment, and professional office users.

Breaking ground 2025.

Location of

Cornerstone of Centerville:

5300 Cornerstone N Blvd,

Centerville, OH 45440

GET DIRECTIONS
